item.title: Interview on the DevOps Radio Podcast
item.description: At the DevOps World | Jenkins World 2019 Conference in Lisbon, I was interviewed by Brian Dawson from the DevOps Radio podcast. We talked about: me Dailymotion Dailymotion’s ad-tech platform Continuous Delivery Jenkins X
